sourcesContent:
About Me

Computer Science graduate with hands-on experience in full-stack development using the MEAN stack. Currently working at Accenture India Pvt. LTD. as a Software Developer, contributing to scalable and sustainable platform solutions. Skilled in Angular, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, SQL, and AWS (S3, EC2). Experienced in Agile methodologies, REST APIs, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud integration. Strong academic background with successful project leadership in machine learning and web application development.

Tech Stack & Expertise

Angular Node.js MongoDB HTML CSS JavaScript TypeScript AWS (S3, EC2) PostgreSQL Express.js Git & GitHub C++ Programming Data Structure

I enjoy building scalable, maintainable applications by combining modern front-end frameworks with robust back-end services. Agile workflows and CI/CD pipelines are an integral part of my daily development cycle, ensuring fast and reliable delivery.

Passionate about cloud technologies and automation, I continuously strive to improve system efficiency and developer experience.

💡 Fun fact: I am currently learning machine learning algorithms to integrate AI-powered features into web apps!

Beyond Technology

When I’m not immersed in code, I come alive as a Poet — a space where stories unfold through voice, rhythm, and presence. Anchoring allows me to blend creativity with communication, a harmony I hold close to heart.

Beyond the stage and screen, I am a passionate reader who finds solace in literature. I’ve explored the rich tapestry of Hindi literature, diving into iconic works like Godaan, Gaban, Nirmala, Rangbhoomi, and Sevasadan. My love for Hindi novels — a true "Hindi Deep" — keeps me rooted in cultural depth and emotional storytelling.

I also enjoy contemporary and classic novels in English, including the mystical narrative of Kafka on the Shore, the haunting beauty of The Kite Runner, the profound introspection in The Alchemist, the rich symbolism of To Kill a Mockingbird, the layered reality of Norwegian Wood, and the emotional depth of A Thousand Splendid Suns. Whether it’s Indian or international, emotional realism or magical fiction, each story offers a new lens through which I view the world.

These narratives, whether shared aloud or printed on a page, enrich my life and fuel my love for storytelling — helping me blend logic with empathy, and technology with heart.
